cs113.calendar.guiview
Class AppointmentEditComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  cs113.calendar.guiview.AppointmentEditComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AppointmentEditComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Controls that allow a user to edit an already-present event. In addition, these controls allow the user to delete an event that was previously created.

Author:
Michael Koval
See Also:
Serialized Form

AppointmentEditComponent

public AppointmentEditComponent(Controller ctrl,
                                ViewState state)
